name: BadBalls
description:
The idea behind this game was to make it simple - you need only a mouse to play it - and to make it really hard, challenging, so you will need to  try again and again, but the game will remain interesting and very attracting.

You got 3 very difficult levels, that each one has it's own tricks and ways to pass it. You also can leave the levels and play the classic game where you need to escape from balls as many time as you can.  we added also simpler difficulties for the levels so even if you feel that you can't complete the original one's, you still will be able to 'taste' out our project.

New levels and version of our project will come depends on how many people liked it, so if you enjoyed playing it, the game was too easy or hard, leave a comment below.

Enjoy BadBalls :)
